message.content:
{"id": "27869", 
 "title": "Bug 27869 - StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData", 
 "description": "Bug 27869 - StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData\nBtw, UTF8 is the default English encoding for Redhat 8.\nFontMetrics API is also heavily used by the StyledText. I believe that the metric information should be cached in the StyledText and updated only when the font is changed.", 
 "OB": "Running eclipse, using the Java Editor:\n- When a single key stroke is pressed, the API Font.getFontData() is called 13 times.\n- This API is also overused when scrolling the StyledText and selecting text.\n- Each Font has 7 FontData, therefore every time I type 'a' in the Java Editor, 91 (713) FontData will be loaded.", 
 "EB": "I believe, and many people agree, that this API should not be used at all by the StyledText when it's being typed.", 
 "SR": "Investigate the overuse of Font.getFontData() in the StyledText and optimize its usage. Consider caching the metric information in the StyledText and updating it only when the font is changed. Additionally, evaluate the need for using Font.getFontData() when the StyledText is being typed."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '27869', 'title': 'Bug 27869StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData', 'description': 'Bug 27869StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData Btw, UTF8is the default english encoding for Redhat 8.FontMetrics API is also very used by the StyledText, I believe that the metricinformation should be cached in the StyledText and update only when the font ischanged. ', 'OB': "Running eclipse, using the Java Editor: A single key stroke can cause the APIFont.getFontData() to be called 13 times. This API is also overused when we are scrolling the StyledText andselecting text. Each Font has 7 FontData, therefore everytime I type 'a' in the JavaEditor 91 (713) FontData will be loaded. ", 'EB': "I believe, and many people agree,that this API don't need to be used at all by the StyledText when it's beentyped. ", 'SR': ''}
